text: Michel Louis Edmond Galabru (27 October 1922 - 4 January 2016) was a French actor. He was known for his roles in Subway (1985), Belle Ã©poque (1992) and as Abraracourcix in Asterix & Obelix Take On Caesar (1999). Galabru was born in Safi, Morocco to French parents. He was raised near Paris, France. He appeared in over 250 movies mostly directed by Bertrand Blier, Jean-Luc Godard, Luc Besson and Costa-Gavras. Galabru died on 4 January 2016 in his home in Paris, France at the age of 93. ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Michel Galabru
